name: Passionfruit Margarita
description: A classic Margarita with a kick of passionfruit and Tajin.
instructions:
Prep Rim: Take a fresh lime wedge and firmly rub the cut side across the upper 2 inch of  half of the glass rim.
Rim: Immediately dip the wet glass rim straight down into a plate of Tajín seasoning to create a uniform coating. Tap gently to remove excess.
Mix & Chill: Combine all remaining liquid ingredients in a cocktail shaker. 
Fill shaker 3/4 full with ice.
Shake: Perform a flash shake (brief, vigorous shake) to combine and chill the ingredients.
Serve: Strain the cocktail over fresh ice in the prepared glass.
Garnish: Finish with a dried lime wheel placed on top of the ice.

name: Grand Margarita
description: Patron Silver, Grand Marnier, Cointreau, agave nectar, orange and lime juices.
instructions: Shake with ice, strain over fresh ice.

name: Southern Belle
description: Absolut Raspberri, lime juice, muddled FRESH raspberries, simple syrup.
instructions: Muddle berries in tin. Add liquids. Shake hard double strain to remove seeds.

name: Pomegranate Martini
description: This dazzling martini marries premium vodka with the vibrant, lush flavor of pomegranate, brightened by a hint of citrus.
instructions: Shake vigorously and strain.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Tito's Vodka, Borghetti Espresso Liqueur, Buffalo Trace Bourbon Cream, espresso.
instructions: Shake very hard to froth. Strain up.

name: Reasoning with Hurricane Season
description: Hurricane season got you down? A heavy pour of rum and passion fruit to help you navigate the chaos.
instructions: Add all ingredients to mixing tin and add ice.  Flash shake and strain over fresh ice.

name: Guinness
instructions: Hard Pour

name: Belle Glos Clark & Telephone
description: Pinot Noir. Santa Maria. Bottle Only.

name: Castello di Albola Chianti
description: A classic expression of Tuscan Sangiovese. This elegant Chianti Classico is bright, vibrant, and medium-bodied, offering lively notes of cherry, wild berries, and a hint of exotic spice, finishing with polished, silky tannins. This Chianti Classico makes it ideal for the richness and marbling of a great steak.

name: Long Island Tea (LIT)
description: The classic five-spirit knockout. Delicious, deceptive, and guaranteed to make your tongue slap your brains around.
instructions: Add all liquors into a pint glass.  Pack glass full of ice.  Add sweet & sour mix. Flash shake with a shaker tin.  Dirty dump back into pint glass.  Top with splash of Coke.  Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Chop House Old Fashioned
description: Chop House's version of the original cocktail.
instructions:
Take the orange slice and rub the peel around the rim of the glass, then drop the orange slice into the glass and slightly muddle.  
Add  2-4 dashes of bitters, the simple syrup, cherries, then the whiskey.  
Add ice and stir.

name: Vesper
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bacardi
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Negroni
instructions: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Rose
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.

name: Tuxedo
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

name: Horse's Neck
instructions: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

name: Planter's Punch
instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.

name: Sea Breeze
instructions: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

name: Clover Club
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: Buck's Fizz is a very similar cocktail but made of two parts champagne to one part orange juice.

name: Whiskey Sour
garnish: Half an orange slice and cherry
instructions: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Screwdriver
instructions: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: Cuba Libre
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Porto Flip
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

name: Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

name: French 75
instructions: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

name: Yellow Bird
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pina Colada
instructions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

name: Aviation
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

name: B52
instructions: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

name: Stinger
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Golden Dream
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: God Mother
instructions: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Spritz Veneziano
instructions: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

name: Bramble
instructions: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

name: Alexander
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

name: French Martini
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

name: Black Russian
instructions: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.

name: Mai-tai
garnish: Pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime wedge
instructions: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

name: Monkey Gland
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Derby
instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sidecar
instructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

name: Sazerac
instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.
